file_unreadable: The file '{file_name}' could not be read due to invalid formatting or corruption.
structure_invalid: The JSON structure in '{file_name}' is invalid. Required fields are missing (e.g., {missing_fields}).
member_invalid: One or more members in '{team_name}' have missing or incorrect fields (e.g., {member_errors}).
domain_invalid: One or more domains in '{team_name}' have missing or incorrect fields (e.g., {domain_errors}).
unknown_error: An unknown error occurred while processing '{file_name}'.
